titleStmt.title: The proofe of a good preacher the right art of hearing : that good counsel is seldom well taken : that wilful offenders are as witlesse as wicked : with an apologie for wholesome truth, how distasteful soever / by J.F.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Younge. Cf. Wing ad BM.
Caption and running title: Good counsel seldome well taken.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
